summary: Diff adds a CraftyMini single-page React landing layout with hero, collection grid, why-choose section, order form logic (mailto generation + validation), contact section, and a warm craft-themed Tailwind/CSS setup. It also introduces unused Internet Identity/auth + actor hooks and an empty backend canister. Some acceptance criteria cannot be verified due to truncation and missing evidence for static image assets.

missing_requirements.requirement: If mailto cannot be opened, the UI still displays the email address and the generated message body for manual copy/paste.
missing_requirements.reason: Order form code sets a `showMessage` state after attempting `window.location.href = mailtoLink`, but the diff excerpt does not include any rendered fallback UI that shows the email address and generated body for copy/paste (only a clipboard-copy function is shown).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: UI references images at /assets/generated/*.png, but the diff summary does not show any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated (only code files were added).

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider/hooks and actor creation with react-query (including anonymous/authenticated actor switching).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says authentication is not required for this build; these hooks and providers are added anyway.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend canister file (empty Motoko actor).
hallucinated_features.reason: No backend functionality was requested (orders are routed via email/Instagram; no external DB/services). Adding a backend canister is not part of stated requirements.
